intro: Daphnidium sinense, commonly known as the Chinese water fern, is a species of aquatic fern belonging to the family Marsileaceae. It is characterized by its small, floating leaves that are typically divided into four lobes, resembling a cloverleaf shape. Daphnidium sinense is also used in traditional Chinese medicine for its purported health benefits.
